data.details:
What are you thankful for? It might be a beloved pet, a special relative, your troop, the community you live in, how much youâ€™re learning in school, your athletic ability, or your creative talent. You might be thankful that you live in a time where girls can do and be anything! Join the University of North Florida Kappa Delta Sorority to share what you are thankful for, do some fun activities, and lend a helpful hand around the UNF campus!  All registered girls will receive a goodie bag and festive fun patch.

$4/Girl Scout, $1/adult

** All attendees must be registered Girl Scouts for the 2016 Membership Year.  All adults must be registered and approved volunteers.

** A chaperone needs to remain onsite throughout the program.  Please see Safety Activity Checkpoints for the ratios.

** We are not able to accommodate tag-a-longs during this session
